text: Sore de kare (yusufu) wa, ototo no fukuro (no kensa) o suru mae ni, kare-ra no fukuro o (shirabe) hajimeta. Soshite (ato ni) ototo no fukuro kara, sore o sagashidashita. Ware wa kono yo ni, yusufu ni sakuryaku o sazuketa. Arra ga nozoma reru igai ni wa, kare wa ototo o (Ejiputo kuni)-o no horitsu no shita de yokuryu suru koto ga dekinakatta nodearu. Ware wa hossuru mono no (eichi no)-kai kurai o takameru. Subete no chisha no ue ni zenchinaru okata wa iru
